channel.title: Interface Glitch?
channel.description:
Okay, I'm cutting right to the chase. On my server, I'm using a source called "UlU Cleaned Allstar" As a base for my Server. I checked it out and after a few minutes I noticed several glitches. There's a pot in the home area and it appears and disappears. Every time i click an object like a door, i get a deposit box interface. When a NPC yells stuff above its head it appears and disappears.
Anyone who helps me will be appreciated and give you an imaginary rep. ( I would give a real one but i cant :( )

item.title: Interface Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Nubcoder Nubcoder
item.description:
@Nubcoder wrote:

Anfernio:

Get the door id, then remove the interface it shows.

I know i should do that but, every single object does it, if i click “chop” on a tree it shows that interface. At first i thought it was the client so i changed clients and the same thing happend

pLEASE HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 06:11:02 pm[/size][hr]Bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 06:16:06 pm[/size][hr]Bump pleqasew

Read full topic
